thread.title: Whimsical rainbow baby image is light slicing through darkness
thread.title_full: Whimsical rainbow baby image is light slicing through darkness

author: Melissa Willets
title: Whimsical rainbow baby image is light slicing through darkness
text:
by Melissa Willets posted in Mom Stories I have featured many emotional and beautiful rainbow baby images on this blog. Like the maternity photograph that simply, yet powerfully honored a rainbow baby, and a new life growing inside one mother. And the raw image of a rainbow baby who was born via a clear-drape c-section. His... Read more Â»

Want to get the full story? Click on the headline above. And thanks for reading the BabyCenter Blog.
